setting.location: Luxurious Moscow apartment, well-appointed drawing room
setting.weather: Interior, natural light from large windows

characters.appearance: Elegant woman, early 30s, beautiful features, melancholy expression, well-groomed
characters.clothing: Expensive day dress, fine jewelry, perfectly styled hair, quality shoes
characters.position: Standing by large window overlooking Moscow street
characters.action: Gazing out window with distant, yearning expression, holding delicate teacup

characters.appearance: Middle-aged domestic servant, 50s, neat appearance, deferential manner
characters.clothing: Simple but clean domestic uniform, white apron, sensible shoes
characters.position: Entering room with silver tea service on tray
characters.action: Setting down tea service on polished table, moving quietly and efficiently

scene.mainElements: Elegant drawing room with fine furniture, Persian rugs, crystal chandelier, bookcases
scene.details: Polished mahogany furniture, silk curtains at tall windows, oil paintings in gold frames, crystal vases with fresh flowers, leather-bound books on shelves, silver tea service with fine china, ornate clock on mantelpiece
scene.background: View through window shows Moscow street with other elegant buildings, tree-lined boulevard
scene.atmosphere: Material comfort contrasted with emotional emptiness, luxury that cannot fill spiritual void, longing for something beyond privileged circumstances, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot from interior, emphasizing contrast between luxury and longing
composition.focus: Woman's wistful expression contrasted with surrounding opulence
composition.depth: Foreground: elegant furniture and tea service; middle ground: woman at window in fine clothing; background: Moscow street scene through large windows
